title: archer at {S}em{E}val-2021 Task 1: Contextualising Lexical Complexity
venue: Proceedings of the 15th International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation (SemEval-2021)
abstract: Evaluating the complexity of a target word in a sentential context is the aim of the Lexical Complexity Prediction task at SemEval-2021. This paper presents the system created to assess single words lexical complexity, combining linguistic and psycholinguistic variables in a set of experiments involving random forest and XGboost regressors. Beyond encoding out-of-context information about the lemma, we implemented features based on pre-trained language models to model the target wordâ€™s in-context complexity.
